recipe.title: Nojito
ingredients: 4 ounces club soda or seltzer water
instructions: Muddle the mint leaves in a cocktail shaker with the lime juice and sugar. Add ice cubes to fill a shaker and pour in the club soda. Gently shake a few times to incorporate (remember: club soda is fizzy). Strain into a medium or tall cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish, if desired.
